definition: to mix/to mingle/muddled/to drift along/to muddle along/to pass for/to get along with sb/thoughtless/reckless

sentences.english: Treatment of restaurant wastewater with polysilicate aluminium was studied.
sentences.chinese: 以聚硅酸鋁爲混凝劑，用化學法絮凝處理餐飲廢水。

sentences.english: Jar test is an important method for determination of proper coagulant dosage.
sentences.chinese: 杯罐試驗是水廠合理確定混凝劑投加量的重要方法。

sentences.english: The study and application of coagulant to water treatment is introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了水處理用混凝劑的研究及應用狀況。

sentences.english: The optimal coagulant dosage exists, and makes flux maximun.
sentences.chinese: 存在最佳混凝劑投加量，它可使膜過濾通量最大。

sentences.english: The develop progress of inorganic polymeric coagulant in recent years were reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了近年來無機高分子混凝劑的研製進展。

sentences.english: This paper discusses several aluminum salt coagulants.
sentences.chinese: 對幾種鋁鹽混凝劑進行了評述。

sentences.english: In this paper, fly ash treated by acids is changed into coagulant.
sentences.chinese: 在本文中粉煤灰經酸處理後，製得混凝劑。

sentences.english: The treatment of waste dyeing water by high-efficient coagulating agent was studied.
sentences.chinese: 採用高效混凝劑對印染廢水處理進行了探討。

sentences.english: Aluminum salt coagulant is the most widely applied inorganic salt coagulant.
sentences.chinese: 鋁鹽混凝劑是應用最爲廣泛的無機鹽類混凝劑。

sentences.english: Aluminum salt coagulant is the most widely applied inorganic salt coagulant.
sentences.chinese: 鋁鹽混凝劑是應用最爲廣泛的無機鹽類混凝劑。

sentences.english: Study on the high effective inorganic polymer coagulant polysilicate ferric aluminum.
sentences.chinese: 高效無機混凝劑聚矽酸鐵鋁的研究。
